title: I need identify this font please
content:
I need identify this font please

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819224750im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BUL_6166.jpg)

thanks
author: fas80

comments.content:
It must be **[Sans Serif Bold FLF Cond](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819224750/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/casady_greene/r_z.htm)** by Richard A. Ware - (Casady & Greene 1986-92)

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819224750/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")

Good catch Fivos! Seems to be it. I firstly thought it could have been [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819224750/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/futura) (Adobe or Linotype's version) squooshed. Darn close these ones, aren't they?
Although there are distinct differences in e.g. /B/J/S/C I agree that the normal weight of "Sans Serif" is really close to Futura ;)
